Sequence Information.Peptide Name: TaARL6IP4 (ADP-ribosylation factor-like protein 6-interacting protein 4, natural AMPs; wheat, plants)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Active against F. graminearum 5035 (IC50 22 uM), A. alternata (IC50 25 uM), F.oxysporum (IC50 >200 uM), C.higginsianum (IC50 >200 uM), and S.sclerotiorum (IC50 >200 uM).

Literature.Author: Liu G, Zuo D-Y, Yang P, He W-J, Yang Z, Zhang J-B, Wu A-B, Yi S-Y, Li H-P, Huang T, Liao Y-C. 2021
Literature.Title: A Novel Deoxynivalenol-Activated Wheat Arl6ip4 Gene Encodes an Antifungal Peptide with Deoxynivalenol Affinity and Protects Plants against Fusarium Pathogens and Mycotoxins

Sequence Information.Comments: Fusion protein was used for antifungal assays.
